Problem:    Quickfix code using memory after being freed. (Dominique Pelle)
Solution:   Detect that the window was closed. (Hirohito Higashi)

patch 7.4.1592
Problem:    Quickfix code using memory after being freed. (Dominique Pelle)
Solution:   Detect that the window was closed. (Hirohito Higashi)
